Sutela.name: Sutela
deathquote: **S:** Well, it was a good run.
**S:** Maybe this was... Not the best idea...
**L:** We will be back to life eventually, right?
**S, L & T:** [long session of sobbing on the ground]

bio.info:
A man with three spirits of separate identity, mind, and control. Likes to explore places. Preferred to be alone, but now is willing to be with people. Still guilty for things out of control, but no longer as worried. He's like a magnet for people.
<Name Meaning> Sutela is comprised of three people's names' parts: **Su**nburn, **Te**mpus and **La**ut. However as a word it translates to __trick__, like a __cover up__, which he used to hide his secrets earlier.

<Clothing> Western hat, fluffy adventurer jacket with logos of Yaretzan mountains, white performance split-toe socks, black leather combat boots
bio.backstory:
He was born with multi-spirituality, from weakness. __The Ascended__, finally born. It was a secret kept to his parents. He was __forced to__ not reveal it. Yet he gathered friends with it. But at 16, it was revealed, from __rumors__.

```The Ascended, from Mythology of Ventrah: someone on an Í¢iÍ¢lÍ¢lÍ¢eÍ¢gÍ¢aÍ¢lÍ¢ state of ascension, growing in spiritual force. Í¢NÍ¢eÍ¢vÍ¢eÍ¢rÍ¢ Í¢mÍ¢eÍ¢aÍ¢nÍ¢tÍ¢ Í¢tÍ¢oÍ¢ Í¢eÍ¢xÍ¢iÍ¢sÍ¢tÍ¢, met with hatred.
Maturity, harmony, and confidence, grants them infinitude.``` 

Ventrah locals were ready for a hunt, by greed, and is still active. He had to __run away__. (Yaretza - dimensional travel).
bio.voice:
__Neutral (Sunburn)__: Pheonix Wright (Ace Attorney)
__Laut__: Commander Shepard (Mass Effect)
__Tempus__: Cuphead (The Cuphead Show!)
bio.theme:
[TBA]

<Debunking a Myth>  Despite having an axolotl's parts, and their species being able to regenerate limbs, Sutela can not achieve that feat, as the other 2 species are the majority of his genetic mess.
bio.likes: Peace and quiet (unless used to chaos), tea, solitude (sometimes), friends (when solitude inapplicable)
bio.dislikes: The feeling of weakness, disruptions of his normal lives, overly bad jokes, seeing people being in pain
bio.fears:
__To be found again__ by ones with a specific intent, horror-like situations

<Passive Abilities>
__From a Red Panda__: Incredible Jump Height, Dexterity and Balance
__From an Axolotl__: Water Breathing, Incredible Swimming Ability
__From a Panda__: Slow Metabolism, Sturdiness
bio.\"a:
A man of three identities, with the ability of changing between them, on accident. Tho they're pretty subtle right now, they can strengthen in a way or another. 3'9 in height, a guy that likes to explore on his own, or not try and spend time with the group. He prefers to be alone because of identity issues and how he believes it can hurt other people. A man of regrets, feeling guilty for a lot of things, but with great ways to cover that up, as a trick, hence 'Sutela'. A stoic, distant person with trust issues, hence why he likes to leave groups whenever he feels like it.

EDIT: As of now he is getting a lot better with himself. He still hides stuff but he is going to be a lot more open about it.

Patella.name: Patella
deathquote: Why you do this to me?
Guess I get no bitches afterall.

bio.info:
'Representation of Death' in thought, in reality a lustful necromancer with ability to cheat death. Narcissistic, rash and reckless. Without fear of Death, which was shown by killing 'because I'm Death.' Can easily do mistakes.
Seems like ever since a gang of people met up with him he quite ended up being a better person.
bio.backstory:
Prior to death memories are cut, however events in and after were vividly remembered.
A gang of people killing him one day after a difficult day, how tragic. Head smashed with a bottle, rib cage pulled, snout distorted, legs left to flesh, one ear ripped... Whoever necromanced him to life is uncertain.

<Amnesia Pieces> ...Babysitting people...
bio.likes: Mind games, murder, weapons, capitalism, victory
bio.dislikes: People, hunger, failing at his job, help
bio.fears:
__The Ascended__ (when angered), Lightning

<Passive Abilities>
Incredible Scythe Proficiency, Knowledge of Technology, Immunity to Life-Killing Diseases*(?)*, No Need to Eat or Drink

*(?)*This means he is immune to things that kill over time, only because he technically is not alive. He's undead. However that doesn't mean he can't be downed, still making him affected by one hit KOs.
bio.name: Patella Necrovi
bio.\"it's: It's unknown. Not sure how, but something must've cut off his memories to a certain moment. But maybe there are some hints lying around. After all, a skull smashed massively must mean something, right?

bio.info:
A pyromaniac that can't get enough of fire tech ever since a young age. Will always carry any of the fire tech he owns, without consideration. They are what allow him to be nefarious. So far, he was lucky with them. Often careless, doesn't listen to people, not willing to learn at moments. Doesn't mean he can't learn. Undying determination will always carry him even at darkest, even if it is him wanting to be an overlord. 
**But what if he had a different perspective on life?**
bio.backstory: Mainly a criminal, living in a not so good city. Used to steal a lot, and still does on occasion. There isn't much to it, really. **However he was the one that contributed to Sutela's change of mentality in big ways. He was the one to spread rumors.**
bio.likes: Pyromaniac tools, feeling above others, undying determination
bio.dislikes: Sharing, learning through mistakes, height-shamed, creepy dolls
bio.fears:
Spending time without a gadget

<Passive Abilities>
Breaking Walls When Running With His Horns, Stretchy Arms, Laced Fists_(?)_, Incredible Aim, Rapid Thinking

*(?)*This one happens when his gloves are taken off. Basically if he punches someone without gloves, a second punch that bleeds the target happens at a later time. However he prefers wearing gloves because of __fair play__, **which is ironic when he isn't fair with people.**
bio.feard:
Spending time without a gadget

<Passive Abilities>
Breaking Walls When Running With His Horns, Stretchy Arms, Laced Fists, Incredible Aim, Rapid Thinking*

*This one happens when his gloves are taken off. Basically if he punches someone without gloves, a second punch that bleeds the target happens at a later time.

physquote: EEEEY YOU! YOU BETTER TAKE THIS %SKILL%
hurtquote: What done ah say about strikin' people for no reason?!

bio.info:
A man born from stars, in what seems to be a transition from soulless to selfless. Extremely empathetic, caring and huggable, yet humble and doesn't like to show himself in the brightest light possible. He still can occasionally do hiccups but you would know that is not necessarily his fault. Afterall, transitions can be hard...

He seems to also be a tad bit gullible, easy to trust in people who seem innocent. He's easy to fool, manipulate. You just gotta use the right strategy for it, but once he'll know about it, he might try educating you someday. ...Don't expect it to be violent tho. He swore not to do harm. This means he won't participate in battles by any means necesary.

He also has a sweet tooth for some reason, big fan of chocolate.
bio.backstory: ....It's for the best to try not pushing for luck. He knows what he had done and deeply regrets it.
bio.likes: Relaxation and reflection, making sure people feel better, hot tea, chocolate, family
bio.dislikes: Snobs, coffee, evildoers, when people look down on themselves, ego in general
bio.fears:
Damage dealt ``from himself on others, whether physical or mental``

<Passive Abilities>
Automatic Empathy, Eternally Awake at Will, Floating, Immunity to Metabolic Disorders, Form Shifting*(?)*

*(?)*He hasn't shifted at all since centuries because he is comfortable with this form, the most recognizable.

bio.info:
Wish is one of the only __Wish Hyphens__ that ever existed, granting wishes to locals around in need. Able to fly with detached wings at relatively fast speed for them. Soft, energetic, very much eccentric, with a beautiful voice that is not to be left rotting. He'd be seen singing quite a lot through their life. But, he can be annoying to people. Usually when that happens, it is because they can't handle Wish's angelic voice.

```Wish Hyphens belong to the same mythology as The Ascended's.```

<Wish Specialty> Evasion and Prosperity
<Wish Quality> Average
<Wish Amount Allowed Per Day> 7

<Fun Fact> If he speaks english without accents and all that jazz, you know he is threatening you.
bio.backstory: __Wish Hyphens__ were born from unknown circumstances in specific places for the sole reason of helping people out with wishes. Wish in this instance was born in a japanese-styled village, where citizens desperately needed safety and evasion would've allowed for that. He had a simple life going through, helping out in need, but the life simply could not last for so long, despite it going for over 500 years. The reason why Wish managed to end up in Yaretza is unknown. Many people over there speculate that as the connection of upper forces, which are defined in the ``Mythology of Ventrah``.
bio.likes: Musicals, beautiful voices, grantish wishes, anything soft, kiwi fruit
bio.dislikes: Evildoers trying to trick, being forced to have his mouth shut, dumb people, being made fun of
bio.fears:
To be alone and useless, awkward silences

<Passive Abilities>
Rapid Flight, Cat-like Reflexes and Flexibility, Cuteness and Appeal( :) ), Incredible Singing Voice, Immortality*(?)*

*(?)*What this actually means is that his cell cycle is super slow, almost at a halt. He will take millions upon millions of years to die, which is enough for people to call as immortality.
bio.voice:
__Normal:__ Yoshi (Super Mario World - Animated Series) [Andrew Sabiston]
__Singing:__ [Sam Cooke](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)

bio.info: A slightly stronger Lychen Imp that Sutela and Patella had pacified on their little adventure. A tad bit overconfident, but still a sunshine to them. They now stay with the group and assist when needed.

Destined to be a guardian of Bloomfall Mineshaft, Terrly tends to be asocial at times. They're unknowing of the world around them, but knows their area the best. Heavy striker, despite being made out of crystal. After a certain group has visited, they opened up to people better, and who knows if they can be seen near the area.
bio.backstory: They got from Ventrah to Yaretza mainly because they felt like needing a place to guard, of which wasn't available in their home world to an extent. No one knows who made them, if they were even made artificially.

bio.info:
The final of the __Wish Hyphens__ that ever existed, granting the quick needs from the locals. Also can fly just like other two. Way too energetic for her own good, doesn't consider people's needs as much and goes for whatever she thinks they need, by assuming way too quick. But hey, the charm in her, and luck, somehow make it all work out. Way more desperate in granting quick needs

<Wish Specialty> Luck and anything worthwhile for a quick moment
<Wish Quality> Terrible, something always goes wrong
<Wish Amount Allowed Per Day> 20
bio.backstory: Need was born in a futuristic utopia, where she was instantly loved and called a 'Baby Flower'. Adored for her own existence, she was used as a marketing tool. She wasn't too happy with that since she didn't get to be herself, so she left the town only a year after birth. She didn't find much of interest in the future. The reason why she went to Yaretza is.... They all seem to be following the same place, huh?
bio.likes: Nature, Flowers, Good Smells, Family, Needs
bio.fears:
That her brothers wouldn't be found, Isolation

<Passive Abilities>
Rapid Flight, Flexibility, Cuteness & Appeal, Immortality(?), Charm(?2)

(?)Seems like this is an innate ability for the species itself

(?2)The power of convincing people

bio.info:
The second of the only __Wish Hyphens__ that ever existed, granting anything the locals dream of. Can also fly fast, just like Wish does. Soft, shy, asks a ton of questions to make sure people are comfortable with their actions. That could get on people's nerves. However there's just something more pure in him that people can't resist. He's a lot more crafty, liking to make things out of metals, and doesn't mind not granting as many dreams.

<Wish Specialty> Purification, Intelligence and Property
<Wish Quality> Excellent, no strings attached
<Wish Amount Allowed Per Day> 3
bio.backstory: Dream, being born in an alleyway, had a sad life going for him. He didn't get to grant much, for there wasn't much for people to dream about where he was born, so he had to move places. He didn't find much luck but only 100 years later he found a small village on alpine mountains that needed a lot of help. He was of great use there, and he was happy the way he was. The reason why he came to Yaretza is unknown, but it could be from the same reason as Wish's.
bio.dislikes: Isolation, Wish, Granting too much, Poor People
bio.fears:
Death, Disasters Out Of His Control

<Passive Abilities>
Rapid Flight, Intelligence, Flexibility, Immortality(?), Quick Crafter, Truth Detection

(?)Works like with Wish's Immortality
